author: jubbster007
title: Nice Little Bonus
review:
Nice little figure although an accessory such as a record would have been nice, but as it's free gift you can't really complain, but i think they may run out fast at the Odeon. Went today (had other things to do valentines day). I managed to get one of each figure when i went in. But after the film when i went back having decided to get a second set to keep as unopened keep sakes. They still had emmet but had run out of the robot already, after only the second day that the film is out.

GET ONE QUICK
